summary: This document is a certification from Rayshawn Campbell, a custodian of records at T-Mobile, confirming the authenticity of records related to subscriber information. The records pertain to a specific time frame and are stated to be true and complete copies of the originals maintained by T-Mobile.

persons.name: Rayshawn Campbell
persons.context: Rayshawn Campbell certifies the authenticity of records maintained by T-Mobile, U.S.A., Inc.

keyFacts: Rayshawn Campbell is employed by T-Mobile, U.S.A., Inc. as a Custodian of Records.
The document certifies that the attached records are duplicates of the original and are true and complete.
The records pertain to subscriber information with a start date of 10/07/2002 and an end date of 11/21/2012.
The records were made in the course of regularly conducted business activity.
The document is marked as confidential.
